tooltipHeader.mtbf: MTBF metric (Mean time between failures): Is the average time between incidents calculated by (Total device working time) / (Broken time).
tooltipHeader.mttr: MTTR metric (Mean Time to Repair): Is the average time calculated by (Total fix time) / (Broken time).
tooltipHeader.mtta: MTTA metric (Mean time to acknowledge): Is the average time to detect the incident calculated by (Total time from incident starts to accredit) /(Total broken time).
tooltipHeader.mttf: MTTF metric (Mean time to failure): Is the average time until the next incident happens (to incident unable to be fixed).
